title: How to get the new Pulsefire Ezreal icon?
body: How do you get the icon?

replies.body: The Pulsefire Ezreal icon comes with his skin along with the timer portal.  I checked your account, and you should have it now.  If you don't see it, give your client a restart, and you may need to scroll down.  I hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=q5fJ9919,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-02T20:16:28.299+0000)
>
> The Pulsefire Ezreal icon comes with his skin along with the timer portal.  I checked your account, and you should have it now.  If you don't see it, give your client a restart, and you may need to scroll down.  I hope that helps!

i have owned pulsefire ez for a long time i only have the ez icon no time portal just logged in today
It looks like you already received the icon on the 2nd.  You might have to scroll down your icon list to find it!
Excuse me , I have been a player for like 3-4 years , owned PulseFire ez for like 2 years and I don't have the new icons only the old one ! Please Rioter , give them to me <3
Added!
me neither
Yes you do.  :D  Check again!
do you get the new icon if you already owned ez?
If you own Pulsefire Ezreal then you should receive the Time Portal icon as well as the Pulsefire Ezreal icon.

It looks like you received yours 2 days ago!  You may need to scroll down your list of icons in case it was missed.
